quest.name: First Line of Defense
objectives: Search for Kumoji's pots of linseed oil to the east of Sakazuki.
Return Kumoji's pots of linseed oil to him.

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: Excuse me, madamsir. Do you have a quick moment? There is something I would like to ask of you.

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: They brought me in from Kugane to inspect the cannons and make sure everything is in working order. Problem is, the boat I came on was rocking so hard that my pots of linseed oil tumbled from their box and slid right into the ocean!

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: As embarrassing as this is to admit, I cannot swim and fetch them myself. You, however, look to be a natural-born diver. Might you go and retrieve them in my stead?

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: If the current is anything to go by, they will have been swept to the west of here, meaning they are somewhere along the eastern coast of Sakazuki.

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: There is a good chance my pots of linseed oil are in the seas to the east of Sakazuki. Please, bring them back to me.

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: Please tell me you managed to find them?

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: Praise the kami! I am saved! Thank you, madamsir. The salty winds here cause metals to corrode at a much faster rate. To protect our cannons, we must frequently slather this oil on them.

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: The Ruby Price is Hingashi's main line of defense. Had I been unable to fulfill my duty, and an enemy nation came to attack, we would have had to face them with rusted cannons! What a disaster that would have been!

dialogue.name: KUMOZI
dialogue.text: My good ladysir, you have done our nation a great service today. Please accept this as a reward.
